SEARCH
Package com.eventlog.sdk.annotation

Annotation Interface LogEvent

@Target(METHOD) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface LogEvent
Log a method execution as an Event Log entry.

Designed for Spring AOP integration. Requires the Event Log Spring Boot starter.

  • Required Element Summary

    Required Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Required Element
    Description
    String
    process
    Business process name (required).

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    errorCode
    Optional error code override for failures.
    EventType
    eventType
    Event type to log (defaults to STEP).
    String
    failureResult
    Optional result override for failure.
    EventStatus
    failureStatus
    Event status to use on failure.
    String
    failureSummary
    Optional summary override for failure.
    boolean
    logOnFailure
    Log on failure (default: true).
    boolean
    logOnSuccess
    Log on success (default: true).
    String
    name
    Human-readable step name (defaults to method name).
    String
    result
    Optional result override for success.
    int
    step
    Step number within the process (optional).
    EventStatus
    successStatus
    Event status to use on success.
    String
    summary
    Optional summary override for success.

  • Element Details

    • process

      String process
      Business process name (required).

    • step

      int step
      Step number within the process (optional).
      Default:
      -1

    • name

      String name
      Human-readable step name (defaults to method name).
      Default:
      ""

    • eventType

      EventType eventType
      Event type to log (defaults to STEP).
      Default:
      STEP

    • successStatus

      EventStatus successStatus
      Event status to use on success.
      Default:
      SUCCESS

    • failureStatus

      EventStatus failureStatus
      Event status to use on failure.
      Default:
      FAILURE

    • summary

      String summary
      Optional summary override for success.
      Default:
      ""

    • failureSummary

      String failureSummary
      Optional summary override for failure.
      Default:
      ""

    • result

      String result
      Optional result override for success.
      Default:
      ""

    • failureResult

      String failureResult
      Optional result override for failure.
      Default:
      ""

    • errorCode

      String errorCode
      Optional error code override for failures.
      Default:
      ""

    • logOnSuccess

      boolean logOnSuccess
      Log on success (default: true).
      Default:

      boolean logOnFailure
